title: Redesigned Google TV app with Highlights news feed rolling out
content:
As announced in March, Google TV is rolling out a redesign that adds a “Highlights” news feed and reorganizes other parts of the Android app.

more…

The post Redesigned Google TV app with Highlights news feed rolling out appeared first on 9to5Google.
